descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Dual Sheath Redux[/color] compatibility patches pack byÂ dptheslothking:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64647/?]LINK[/url]

***

[color=#ffff00]Noble Artifacts for Skyrim[/color] v0.9 Eng/Rus

[color=#ffff00]Credits[/color]:
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures, adaptation
TemniyKot - adaptation
REDMAN - screenshots

This mod adds 19 artifacts from earlier TES games.

List:
- Chrysamere
- Ice blade of the Monarch (1H + 2H)
- Umbra (1H + 2H)
- Goldbrand
- Eltonbrand
- Gravedigger
- Cleaver of St. Felms
- Fang of Haynektnamet
- Dagger of Symmachus
- Thornblade
- Trueflame
- Hopesfire
- Scourge
- Jyggalag's sword
- Skullcrusher
- Staff of Hasedoki
- Eleidon's Ward

[color=#ffff00]To obtain all this stuff[/color] you have to check the "Dwarven storeroom" near Mzulft (Southeast from Windhelm). Search for an old wooden chest.

***

[color=#ffff00]!!!USE ONLY ONE ESP-FILE!!![/color]

***

[color=#ffff00]
Also:
[/color]
Wanna see my another Skyrim mods? Check my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2931683]Skyrimnexus page[/url].

Or join me on Patreon if you like my works!
